title: Senior Global Pricing Strategy Lead - Services
summary: The Services team at Apple provides customers around the world with access to an incredible collection of content across apps, music, games, fitness, movies, TV, news, books, iCloud, and more. We are looking for a talented strategy expert to join our exciting Global Pricing Strategy team.
description: You will help craft the global pricing strategy for Apple services, including the App Store, Apple One, Apple Music, iCloud, Apple TV+, Apple Arcade, Apple News+ and more. Projects are varied and could include: New product launch or expansion of existing services to new countries, Price updates due to business strategy or market changes, Pricing performance monitoring and analysis, Ad hoc pricing projects and campaigns.
preferred_qualifications: Knowledge of SQL, and Python/R a plus
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $165,500 and $293,800, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs.
